ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT($Permission.By_Pass_Validation_for_Migration) && SCC_Call_Type__r.External_Id__c = '8713' && (TEXT(Status) != 'Working' && TEXT(Status) != 'New') && ( ISBLANK(SCC_Amount__c) || SCC_Account_Number__c = null || ISBLANK(SCC_Waktu_Transaksi__c) || SCC_Brizzi_Card_Number__c = null || SCC_Amount__c > 10000000)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Wajib isi Nomor Rekening, Kartu Brizzi, Waktu Transaksi & Nominal ( Nominal tidak boleh lebih dari 10.000.000 )
